description: Corrugated cardboard is a paperboard material with alternating layers of planar and fluted patterns used in shipping and packaging.
short desc: Corrugated cardboard is alternating layers of planar and fluted paperboard often used in packaging.
source: Samples cut from a single 9.5 mm thick shingle.

derived property.test description: Effective heat of combustion [MJ/kg] is calculated from data collected in micro-scale combustion calorimeter experiments.
